# SDK Guide

## Overview

<!-- Describe available SDKs and client libraries for the {{repoName}} API. -->

## Available SDKs

| Language | Package | Version | Repository |
|----------|---------|---------|------------|
| <!-- e.g. TypeScript --> | <!-- e.g. @org/sdk --> | <!-- e.g. 1.0.0 --> | <!-- URL --> |
| <!-- e.g. Python --> | <!-- e.g. org-sdk --> | <!-- e.g. 1.0.0 --> | <!-- URL --> |

## Installation

### TypeScript / JavaScript

```bash
# npm
npm install <!-- @org/sdk -->

# pnpm
pnpm add <!-- @org/sdk -->
```

### Python

```bash
pip install <!-- org-sdk -->
```

## Quick Start

```typescript
import { Client } from '<!-- @org/sdk -->';

const client = new Client({
  apiKey: process.env.API_KEY,
});

// List resources
const resources = await client.resources.list({ limit: 10 });
```

## Configuration Options

| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|--------|------|---------|-------------|
| `apiKey` | `string` | — | Your API key |
| `baseUrl` | `string` | `https://api.example.com/v1` | API base URL |
| `timeout` | `number` | `30000` | Request timeout in ms |
